title: Modern Hangzhou Elegance Near Shanghai with Two Restaurants, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Right in the heart of Hangzhou, this city break has all the hallmarks of an elegant French hotel with local warmth that feels both stylish and welcoming. Enjoy city skyline views from beautifully designed rooms that have all the comforts you need after a day exploring the sights.

If you're craving a bite to eat, Carrousel serves up international delicacies all day long, while Terroir offers seasonal Hangzhou flavours made by expert chefs. When it's time to relax, take a dip in the indoor heated pool or indulge in a soothing spa treatment. With friendly service and top-notch facilities, this is your next base for an unforgettable adventure.
offer_address: 485 Mingxing Road, Xiaoshan District, Hangzhou 311200, China

title: Sophisticated China Escape Near Iconic Thousand Island Lake
description: Embrace a thousand possibilities among dramatic limestone karst, mysterious caves and shimmering turquoise waters at InterContinental OneThousand Island Lake Resort, an IHG Hotel, located in one of China’s most spellbinding regions. Awaken to unparalleled views of the Xianshan Peninsula before heading to the waterfront, returning after the day's adventures to sate your appetite with traditional omakase at YING Japanese Restaurant, or Chinese plates at Xian Restaurant.
location_description: InterContinental OneThousand Island Lake Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Qiandaohu Xianshan Peninsula, Chun'an County, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China, 311700

title: Ultra-Modern Hangzhou Urban Escape with Three Top-Rated Restaurants
description: Dreamy scenes of the West Lake make Hangzhou a must-visit destination, best explored from your base at Crowne Plaza Hangzhou Science City, an IHG Hotel. When you're not exploring the silver skyscrapers or the pagoda-studded hillside, enjoy quiet moments of respite in the palatial heated indoor swimming pool. There's no need to travel far for a great meal with three onsite restaurants set to satisfy every craving including local cuisine, signature cocktails and bountiful buffet dinners.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hangzhou Science City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Chuangjing Road and Yuhangtang Road intersection, Hangzhou 310000, China

title: Striking Five-Star Hangzhou Hotel with Five Restaurants
description: Escape to the glowing gold orb of InterContinental Hangzhou, an IHG Hotel, in the centre of China’s vibrant southern city.  Architecturally astonishing, the futuristic exterior of the hotel is something to be admired, with the interior offering opulent luxuries, including five onsite restaurants. Soak up the city's diverse culture with a trip to the dreamy West Lake and surrounding temples, experience the vibrant nightlife or wander the authentic night markets.
offer_address: No. 2 Jiefang East Road, Hangzhou, 310016, Mainland China

title: Serene Chinese Tea Capital Escape near West Lake
description: voco Hangzhou Binjiang Minghao, an IHG Hotel, offers a serene escape in the bustling heart of China's tea capital. Savour local cuisine at Mingxuange restaurant or a soothing cup of Hangzhou's famed Dragon Well tea at the Lobby Lounge. Work up a sweat at the fitness centre, indulge in a treatment at the spa or some retail therapy in Hangzhou's high-end boutiques. Relish the serenity of a walk along the nearby Qiantang river before retiring to a guest room or suite for a well-earned rest.
location_description: voco Hangzhou Binjiang Minghao, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 558 Jiangnan Avenue, Binjiang District, Hangzhou 310051, China

title: Stylish Hangzhou Escape Near Shanghai with Onsite Dining, Indoor Pool & Rooftop Entertainment Complex
description:
Bask in the opulence of Hangzhou's prestigious Qianjiang New Town Central Business District, with a stay at this retreat that effortlessly blends modern luxury with traditional Chinese elegance. This architectural marvel towers above the Qiantang River, offering breathtaking views of the city's skyline and the mesmerising river tide.

Savour authentic local Zhejiang and Cantonese cuisine at the Dining Room, or sip on handcrafted cocktails at Forty8 Bar. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the city's rich cultural heritage, with West Lake, China National Silk Museum and the Grand Canal within easy reach.
offer_address: No 1366 Qianjiang Road, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, Hangzhou 310020, China

title: Sophisticated Hangzhou City Break Near West Lake
description: Classical Song Dynasty-inspired design meets retro-chic Miami-style glamour at Hotel Indigo Hangzhou Uptown, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned on the legendary shores of the West Lake region. After days spent exploring the city’s many delights - including ancient porcelain at the Southern Song Dynasty Kiln Museum and Lingyin Temple’s famed rock carvings - return to afternoon tea at ING restaurant or quiet moments on the light-filled outdoor patio.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Hangzhou Uptown, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 8 North Shui Cheng Road, Shang Cheng District, Hangzhou ZJ 310008, China

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Hz One Thousand Island Lake
title: Stylish China Escape near Iconic Thousand Island Lake Region
description: Discover endless mountains of lush greenery and turquoise waters at Crowne Plaza Hangzhou One Thousand Island Lake, an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of one of China’s most celebrated regions. Boasting a unique, nautical-themed architectural design, the hotel offers guests the perfect chance to soak up Hangzhou's famed serenity. Awaken to striking views of Qiandao Lake before spending your days fishing, boating or swimming in shimmering waters.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hangzhou One Thousand Island Lake, an IHG Hotel

title: Sophisticated China City Break within World Heritage-Listed Liangzhu near West Lake
description: Discover the neolithic history and natural beauty of one of China’s most cherished regions with a stay at InterContinental Hangzhou Liangzhu, an IHG Hotel. The countless treasures of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Liangzhu heritage region are within easy reach - uncover jade artifacts and modern architectural delights at the adjacent Hangzhou Liangzhu Cultural Museum, or journey just 30 minutes to admire the spectacular beauty of West Lake, immortalised over millennia in poetry and song.
location_description: Intercontinental Hangzhou Liangzhu, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.18 Yuniao Street, Yuhang District, Hangzhou, 311113, China

title: Stylish China Hangzhou Escape near Iconic West Lake
description: Situated in the heart of Qiantang - the city’s vibrant business district - Crowne Plaza Hangzhou HEDA Hotel, an IHG Hotel, offers guests easy access to the region’s countless charms, including ancient temples, historic tea villages and the legendary beauty of West Lake. After days spent exploring Hangzhou’s extraordinary heritage, return to CHAR Bar & Bistro for signature steaks and fine wines or enjoy moments spent in the hotel’s beautiful indoor pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hangzhou HEDA, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.523 Jinsha Avenue, Qiantang District, Hangzhou 310018, China
